definitions.definition: A sudden , often uncontrolled movement , especially of the human body.

examples: When I yell "OK," give the mooring line a good jerk !

definitions.definition: ( originally Canada , US , slang , derogatory ) A person with unlikable or obnoxious qualities and behavior, typically mean , self-centered , or disagreeable .
examples: I finally fired him, because he was being a real jerk to his customers, even to some of the staff.
You really are a jerk sometimes.

definitions.definition: ( US , slang , derogatory ) A stupid person; an idiot or fool .
( weightlifting ) A lift in which the weight is taken with a quick motion from shoulder height to a position above the head with arms fully extended and held there for a brief time.

subdefinitions.definition: ( Internet slang ) An act of satirizing behavior that is, to an extent, common in a community, especially in circlejerk subreddits .

definitions.definition: ( preceded by definite article ) A dance , popular in Western culture in the 1960s, in which the head and upper body is thrown forwards regularly to the beat of the music.
( physics , engineering ) The rate of change in acceleration with respect to time .

main_definition: A sudden , often uncontrolled movement , especially of the human body.
secondary_definitions: ( originally Canada , US , slang , derogatory ) A person with unlikable or obnoxious qualities and behavior, typically mean , self-centered , or disagreeable .
( US , slang , derogatory ) A stupid person; an idiot or fool .
( weightlifting ) A lift in which the weight is taken with a quick motion from shoulder height to a position above the head with arms fully extended and held there for a brief time.
( preceded by definite article ) A dance , popular in Western culture in the 1960s, in which the head and upper body is thrown forwards regularly to the beat of the music.
( physics , engineering ) The rate of change in acceleration with respect to time .

definitions.definition: Meat (or sometimes vegetables) cured by jerking, in which it is coated in spices and slow-cooked over a fire or grill traditionally composed of green pimento wood positioned over burning coals; charqui .
examples: Jerk chicken is a local favorite.

main_definition: ( Caribbean , Jamaica ) A rich, spicy Jamaican marinade .
secondary_definitions: ( Caribbean , Jamaica ) Meat (or sometimes vegetables) cured by jerking, in which it is coated in spices and slow-cooked over a fire or grill traditionally composed of green pimento wood positioned over burning coals; charqui .
